verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> of David הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> how טּ֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Behold how good וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and how נָּעִ֑ים <S%H5273><s%> and how pleasant שֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell אַחִ֣ים <S%H251><s%> [it is] for brethren גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again יָֽחַד׃ <S%H3162><s%> together

כַּשֶּׁ֤מֶן <S%H8081><s%> ointment הַטּ֨וֹב ׀ <S%H2896><s%> [It is] like the precious עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הָרֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head יֹרֵ֗ד <S%H3381><s%> that ran down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַזָּקָ֥ן <S%H2206><s%> upon the beard זְקַֽן־ <S%H2206><s%> beard אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> [even] Aaron's שֶׁ֝יֹּרֵ֗ד <S%H3381><s%> that went down עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> to the skirts מִדּוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H4060><s%> of his garments

כְּטַל־ <S%H2919><s%> As the dew חֶרְמ֗וֹן <S%H2768><s%> of Hermon שֶׁיֹּרֵד֮ <S%H3381><s%> [and as the dew] that descended עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַרְרֵ֪י <S%H2042><s%> upon the mountains צִ֫יּ֥וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֨ם ׀ <S%H8033><s%> there צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> for there the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרָכָ֑ה <S%H1293><s%> the blessing חַ֝יִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> [even] life עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for evermore
